radiographic_examinations.findings: Imaged lung bases are clear. The liver, spleen, bilateral kidneys, bilateral adrenal glands, and pancreas appear unremarkable. Mild fat stranding surrounding a diverticulum along the proximal sigmoid colon. The appendix is dilated up to 1.1 cm with mild periappendiceal fat stranding and an appendicolith at the base of the appendix. No evidence of perforation.
